alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Floyd, northeastern Breathitt and southern Magoffin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stevenson, or 7 miles east of Jackson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lambric, Daisydell and Foraker around 335 PM EDT. Tiptop and Carver Station around 340 PM EDT. Duco, Waldo, Carver, Swampton, Evanston, Conley Station, Royalton, Marshallville, Sublett and West Royalton Station around 345 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fredville, Gapville, Ordway, Orchard, Gypsy, Gunlock, Mid, Blue River, Dotson, Brainard, Pyramid, Bonanza, Hueysville and Hippo. THIS INCLUDES Kentucky Highway 80 in Floyd County near mile marker 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for southeastern Kentucky.
